data.text: Nye Mawu, nye Mawu, nu ka ŋuti nègblẽm ɖi?
O! Nye Mawu, medo ɣli na wò le ŋkeke
Ke wò la, èle kɔkɔe, eye Israel ƒe kafukafuhawo zu
Mewòe mía fofowo tsɔ woƒe xɔse dee,
Wodo ɣli na wò, eye nèɖe wo,
Ke nye la, ŋɔ menye, menye amegbetɔ o,
Ame siwo katã kpɔm la ɖe alɔme le ŋunye;
“Eka ɖe Yehowa dzi,
Ke wòe hem tso vidzidɔ me,
Wòe nye nye Mawu tso danye ƒe dɔ me
Mèganɔ adzɔge tso gbɔnye o,
Nyitsu geɖewo ɖe to ɖem;
Woke woƒe nuwo ɖe ŋunye baa
Woƒom ɖe anyi abe tsi ene,
Ŋusẽ vɔ le ŋunye abe ze gbagbã ene,
Avuwo ƒo xlãm,
Mate ŋu axlẽ nye ƒuwo,
Woma nye awuwo na wo nɔewo,
Ke wò, O! Yehowa, mèganɔ adzɔge o;
Ɖe nye agbe tso yi ƒe asi me,
Ɖem le dzatawo ƒe nu me,
Maɖe gbeƒã wò ŋkɔ na nɔvinyewo,
Mi ame siwo vɔ̃a Yehowa, mikafui!
Elabena menyɔ ŋu alo do vlo
Gbɔwòe nye kafukafuha si medzina
Hiãtɔwo aɖu nu aɖi ƒo;
Anyigba ƒe mlɔenu katã hã aɖo ŋku edzi,
Elabena fiaɖuɖu la nye Yehowa tɔ,
Kesinɔtɔ siwo katã le anyigba dzi la
Dzidzimewo asubɔe, eye dzidzime siwo ava dzɔ la,
Woaɖe gbeƒã eƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye na
